entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is described as slender and beautiful with long silvery blonde hair. She is one of the people Harry feels fond of.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is described as taller and broad-shouldered. He is also mentioned to be looking after the Muggle Prime Minister.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described with his wild hair and beard, standing hunchbacked to avoid hitting his head on the ceiling.

entities.name: mundungus fletcher
entities.description: Mundungus Fletcher is described as small, dirty, and hangdog, with droopy bloodhoundâ€™s eyes and matted hair. Harry had tried to strangle him the last time they met.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned to be on top of the washing machine, wiggling her left hand at Harry with a ring glittering there.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned in relation to Tonks' marriage.

relationships.description: Kingsley is looking after the Muggle Prime Minister.
